lines.i: This clinical statement represents current and/or prior pregnancy dates enabling investigators to determine if the subject of the case report was pregnant during the course of a condition.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:16768, CONF:16868 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.8"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:451)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:452)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:454)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:455)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="77386006" Pregnant (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:457)
The value of the observation shall be recording using a data type appropriate to the coded observation according to the table provided by IHE PCC specification.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:2018)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:458, CONF:459, CONF:15584)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Estimated Date Of Delivery (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:451)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:452)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:454)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:455)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:2018)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="77386006" Pregnant (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:457)
The value of the observation shall be recording using a data type appropriate to the coded observation according to the table provided by IHE PCC specification.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:458, CONF:459, CONF:15584)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Estimated Date Of Delivery (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.1)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.8"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1357337877"/> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" codeSystemName="HL7ActCode" displayName="Assertion"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.1"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1780205922"/> <code code="11778-8" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
